data.title: Management Team – Avenu Medical
data.text:
Mr. Beney has more than 30 years of experience in senior sales leadership positions within the medical device industry. Prior to joining Avenu Medical, Mr. Beney served as Vice President of Sales at Focal Therapeutics (acquired by Hologic), Vice President of International Sales and Business Development at Cianna Medical (acquired by Merit Medical), Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Intact Medical Corporation (acquired by Medtronic), and as the National Sales Manager for the Breast Care division of Johnson & Johnson (formerly Biopsys Medical). In addition Mr. Beney has also held executive management positions with Conceptus, Neurometrix and Scimed Life Systems. Mr. Beney earned his Bachelor of Arts degree in Advertising from Michigan State University.

Mr. Driscoll has over 20 years of experience in the development, sales and marketing of medical devices. Prior to Avenu Medical, he led the commercialization efforts for the BioZorb® implant as Vice President of Marketing for Focal Therapeutics, Inc. Mr. Driscoll’s previous experience includes serving as Vice President of Marketing for Cianna Medical, a leading manufacturer of devices for the treatment of breast cancer. Prior to that, he held various senior sales and marketing positions at other medical device manufacturers, including Interpore Cross International, Silipos, Inc. and Innovation Sports, Inc.

Mr. Driscoll earned his B.S. in Health Education from the University of Cincinnati.

Prior to joining Avenu Medical in 2011, Mr. Kellerman was the Director of Research & Development at ROX Medical where he led the development of the ROX AC1 and AC2 percutaneous arteriovenous fistula creation systems. He has a proven track record of developing new, novel therapies and procedures and extensive experience training physicians and proctoring clinical cases. Prior to joining ROX, Mr. Kellerman worked at Guidant developing guidewires, drug eluting stents, and heart failure delivery systems. Mr. Kellerman has filed for over 20 patents and holds a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering from San Diego State University.

Before joining Avenu Medical in 2018, Mr. Hettmann served as an advisor to Avenu since 2010 helping the company establish administrative and financial infrastructure and governance. Mr. Hettmann has more than 25 years of experience in senior and executive positions in finance, operations and administrative roles with technology companies. Prior to joining Avenu, Mr. Hettmann served as CFO for Neology, Inc. Prior to Neology, Mr. Hettmann has held executive positions at publicly-traded companies such as Microsemi and Conexant, and at venture-backed companies such Symwave and Siimpel. Mr. Hettmann was also a Co-founder of u-Nav, a GPS technology company acquired by Qualcomm. Mr. Hettmann holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Business Economics from UC Santa Barbara and a Master’s degree in Business Administration from Santa Clara University.
